name: Down-Upside
startIntroPart2: Great Prince Spect, the people look up to you to lead them to greater days of glory. Their determination is strong, and now they turn to you, their beloved iron chancellor, to guide them once more. Will you rule and conquer through blood and iron, or foster the arts and industry? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: I cannot wait until ye grow even mightier. Therefore, prepare for war!
attacked: Corrupted villain! We will bring you into the ground!
defeated: Germany has been destroyed. I weep for the future generations.
introduction: Guten tag. In the name of the great German people, I bid you welcome.
tradeRequest: It would be in your best interest, to carefully consider this proposal.
uniques: When conquering an encampment, gain [-25] Gold
[-25]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
[+50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
Unhappiness from number of Cities doubled
[1] Movement point cost to disembark <for [All] units>
Gain [-90] Influence with a [Great Person] gift to a City-State
When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [-10]% boost to great person generation
May choose [-1] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
[-1 Faith] [in all cities] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [unimproved] [Forest] tiles>
[-2 Faith] [in all cities] <with [3] to [6] neighboring [unimproved] [Forest] tiles>
[-20]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
